{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Beelink |model=Mini MX |revision=III v2.0 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |est_release_date=06/2016 |type=Android media player |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG2GE4A-A001 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3P4GF4BLF |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-CM273SM |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9377 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=MicroSD Card slot, SPDIF |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Android;6.0; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=F0:03:8C |oui_eth=46:28:02 }} {{TagLine|Kodi Media Center}}
"Mini MXIII [II] V20_20160629" and "beelink" :are silkscreened on the main board.
